::Repugnus/JetV::
Repugnus looks to the drunk then promptly walks onto the ship, the 
ugly bot jsut huddling up into a corner.

JetV smiled and frowned at the same time.  "Time to leave, time to 
become a hero, or a piece of scrap. Pacifix will be a great 
commander, but that other one, that was dubbed as to extreme to comoe 
on the ship, Crotale, could have been a great help." he said to 
himself as he hit the countdown button.  The ship began 
speaking. "This vessel will take off in 1:00 and counting, 59, 
58,57,56,55,54,53,52,51,50,49,48,47,46,45,44,43,42,41,40,39,38,37,36,3
5,34,33,32,31,30....."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> --- Pacifix / Crossroads / Afterburner / Scattershot / Nosecone ---
> 
> Pacifix shakes his head at Grimlock's back, and nods to the both 
> of them, "Welcome to the team, Dios and Repungus. You should 
> board the ship promptly, that last message was my pilot." He turns 
> to Hoist, "It will be a pleasure to have you along, Hoist. Would 
you 
> please join the rest of the crew, we leave soon, as you have just 
> heard." Pacifix waits for the others to board. He wants to talk to 
> Ironhide before the leave.
> 
> Crossroads get settled in, and awaits the launch.
> 
> Afterburner races onto the ship, anxious to go, and he sits down 
> quickly. He is swiftly followed by the down-to-business Scattershot 
> who takes a seat beside the impatient Technobot. Nosecone 
> wonders onto the ship, taking in all of the technology on board the 
> stealth prototype Autobot cruiser deemed "Hidden One" by Pacifix 
> due to its cloaking and stealth abilities.
> 
> 
> On 13 Jun 2001, at 22:20, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> 
> > ::Dios::
> > 
> > The drunk shruggs his large shoulders when the other two turn to 
him.
> > "Nothing left here on Cybertron but bad drinks and worse 
memories. I
> > guess I'm in. My name is Dios."
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > > ::Repugnus/Slag/JetV::
> > > He smiled. He liked how Grimlock thought. "Yes I will join
> > > you. How bout you?" he said looking to the drunk. "Anyways, 
waht is
